mapper.select: select res_flow, res_name, res_path from stigeradmin.sys_resource where exists( select null from sys_role_resource where sys_resource.res_flow = sys_role_resource.res_flow and sys_role_resource.role_flow = #{roleFlow} and sys_role_resource.delete_flag = 'N' ) and delete_flag = 'N'

select role_flow, role_code, role_name from stigeradmin.sys_role
role_code = #{searchCode}
and role_name like concat(concat('%', #{searchName}), '%')
and exists ( select null from sys_resource, sys_role_resource where sys_resource.res_name like concat(concat('%', #{searchResName}), '%') and sys_resource.res_flow = sys_role_resource.res_flow and sys_role.role_flow = sys_role_resource.role_flow and sys_resource.delete_flag = 'N' and sys_role_resource.delete_flag = 'N' )
and delete_flag = 'N'
order by role_code
